question: Which city in the world is known as the "Diamond Quarter"?
explanation: Antwerp is the city proper of Belgium. Antwerp city is known as the diamond capital of the world. Antwerp's diamond district is known as the Diamond Quarter. It is the largest diamond district in the world. The Antwerp Diamond Exchange was established around 1456. It handles almost 84% of the world's rough diamonds and 50% of the cut diamonds.
